description:
Organisational Change Management is the approach to managing people in a project management environment. 

In this series Jo Peacock investigates the relevance of OCM in the project environment, approaches to OCM, and impacts of under-performing OCM. 

This series will also contribute toward preparation for the PMI certification.
descriptionMD:
Organisational Change Management is the approach to managing people in a project management environment. 

In this series Jo Peacock investigates the relevance of OCM in the project environment, approaches to OCM, and impacts of under-performing OCM. 

This series will also contribute toward preparation for the PMI certification.
name: PMI: Organizational Change Management
subtitle: Implementing tranformational projects

episodes.description:
Organisational Change Management is the approach to managing people in a project management environment. 

In this series Jo Peacock investigates the relevance of OCM in the project environment, approaches to OCM, and impacts of under-performing OCM. 

This series will also contribute toward preparation for the PMI certification.
episodes.title: Overview
episodes.transcript:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:08.671
[MUSIC]

2
00:00:08.671 --> 00:00:10.536
Hi, I'm Jo Peacock with ITPRO.TV, and

3
00:00:10.536 --> 00:00:13.810
welcome to your
Organizational Change Management series.

4
00:00:13.810 --> 00:00:17.757
And in this series, what we're going
to do is we're going to take a look at

5
00:00:17.757 --> 00:00:21.913
organizational change management from
a project management perspective.

6
00:00:21.913 --> 00:00:26.568
So we're going to look at organizational
change management as it relates to

7
00:00:26.568 --> 00:00:30.000
portfolios, and
as it relates to program management.

8
00:00:30.000 --> 00:00:32.546
And also as it relates
to project management.

9
00:00:32.546 --> 00:00:36.653
And of course, with any organizational
change management series,

10
00:00:36.653 --> 00:00:40.685
we're going to be putting a focus
on the people aspect, too.

11
00:00:40.685 --> 00:00:44.752
Now this particular series
will prepare you for your PMI,

12
00:00:44.752 --> 00:00:50.905
your project management institute, PMP
professional certification, so feel free.

13
00:00:50.905 --> 00:00:54.277
Though if you are not preparing for
any certification,

14
00:00:54.277 --> 00:00:58.235
then you may learn something here
to do with dealing with people.

15
00:00:58.235 --> 00:01:01.291
And managing stakeholders
within your project.

16
00:01:01.291 --> 00:01:04.225
So I hope to see you then
in one of our episodes on

17
00:01:04.225 --> 00:01:06.650
Organizational Change Management.

18
00:01:08.648 --> 00:01:09.884
[MUSIC]

episodes.description: The opening episode in the OCM series introduces the concept of Change and the impacts that change at organisational level has.
episodes.title: What is Change?

episodes.description: Exploring the roles, functions,and activities required at various management levels to effectively manage OCM.
episodes.title: Role and Activities

episodes.description: A look at change models, the emotional cycle of change, the 3 orders of change, the technology adoption curve, the reasons for change, and the Gartner hype cycle..
episodes.title: Change Categories

episodes.description: Here Jo looks at the impact of corporate culture on changeincluding the change lifecycle, emotional and other responses to change, and how the Kotter approach to transformational change management can facilitate success at OCM.
episodes.title: Corporate Culture

episodes.description: An insight into the SEF; Stanford’s Strategic Execution Framework and the CSF’s for OCM.
episodes.title: Strategic Change

episodes.description: A discussion on commonly identified barriers and potential resistance to successful OCM including a look at how to identify potential sources of resistance and techniques for overcomming them in the IT environment.
episodes.title: Barriers to Change

episodes.description: In additional to barriers preventing OCM an IT environment also faces challenges that frequently occur during organisational change. In this episode we look at the challenges and explore ways of overcoming those.
episodes.title: Overcoming Challenges

episodes.description: This episode looks at how OCM is managed at Portfolio level.
episodes.title: Portfolio Change Mangement

episodes.description: These episodes look at how OCM is managed at Programme level.
episodes.title: Program Change Management

episodes.description: These episodes look at how OCM is managed at Programme level.
episodes.title: Program Change Management Part 2

episodes.description: This episode looks at how OCM is managed at Project level.
episodes.title: Project Change Management

episodes.description: These final 2 episodes explore how OCM is implemented across the IT environment using the Change Lifecycle and how OCM is managed on an ongoing basis.
episodes.title: Performing the Change

episodes.description: These final 2 episodes explore how OCM is implemented across the IT environment using the Change Lifecycle and how OCM is managed on an ongoing basis.
episodes.title: Performing the Change Part 2
